Uses of Interface
java.nio.file.CopyOption

  • Packages that use CopyOption 
    Package Description
    java.nio.file
    Defines interfaces and classes for the Java virtual machine to access files, file attributes, and file systems.
    java.nio.file.spi
    Service-provider classes for the java.nio.file package.

    • Uses of CopyOption in java.nio.file

      Classes in java.nio.file that implement CopyOption 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  LinkOption
      Defines the options as to how symbolic links are handled.
      class  StandardCopyOption
      Defines the standard copy options.
      Methods in java.nio.file with parameters of type CopyOption 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static long Files.copy​(InputStream in, Path target, CopyOption... options)
      Copies all bytes from an input stream to a file.
      static Path Files.copy​(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options)
      Copy a file to a target file.
      static Path Files.move​(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options)
      Move or rename a file to a target file.

    • Uses of CopyOption in java.nio.file.spi

      Methods in java.nio.file.spi with parameters of type CopyOption 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      abstract void FileSystemProvider.copy​(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options)
      Copy a file to a target file.
      abstract void FileSystemProvider.move​(Path source, Path target, CopyOption... options)
      Move or rename a file to a target file.
